data.summary: Insufficient evidence to validate the requirement.
data.assessment: The exploratory step requires validation that the system opens the next slot when one is booked. However, the evidence provided does not confirm this behavior; it only shows that bookings have been made without specifying the visibility of available slots. The linked use case mentions that regular patients see only the next 3 available slots, but there is no direct evidence in the prior steps to confirm that this requirement is implemented or functioning as required.
gaps: No evidence confirming that the next slot opens upon booking.
